name: The cake is surrounded by shackles
name_original: The cake is surrounded by shackles
description:
This is a simple casual game

There is a cake in the middle of the screen
The left and right sides of the screen will be irregular, in random locations, cockroach
I will go to the cake, there are moving fast, and there are slow moving
Players want to eliminate cockroaches and protect the cake
When you arrive at the cake
Players will lose a little life
When life is zero, the game is over


Method of operation

Click on the screen with the mouse
Move the mouse over the cockroach and click the left mouse button
